item.description:
If a bunch of us want to go we can meet and ride together  

Please email Brandee at MOMs to RSVP if you are planning on going.  Her email is  brandee@momsnh.com

 Meet up location details to follow

      

                Ladies Night @ MOM'South!  


Thursday July 7th, 6:00pm-9:00pm

 To show the ladies our appreciation, MOM'South will be hosting their first ever Ladies Night on Thursday, July 7th from 6:00pm-9:00pm. The invite goes out to all the gals that share our passion for motorcycles! This event is at our Foxboro location:
108 Washington Street (Route 1) in Foxboro, MA. (508) 543-1734 Our goal is to have a fun night with the ladies, so we'll have: information & demonstrations geared toward female riders, food, music, vendors, prizes & more! If you're thinking about updating some of your riding gear ladies, this is your night! We're bringing in a trailer load full of helmets, jackets, pants, gloves, boots and more! Ladies who attend Ladies Night will be offered a 25% discount on their purchase of riding gear and apparel for that evening. We'd love your input! If you plan on attending, email me or give me a call and let me know if there are any questions that you'd like to have covered. This night is about you, so let me know!
Please RSVP by Friday June 17th. The first 25 ladies to RSVP will receive a complimentary MOM'South gift bag!

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: Ladies Night At Mom"s South
